column5: I had a client today that works in an executive capacity for one of our more well known professional fisherpersons here in Canada. I won't divulge his name as client confidentiality is important to me. I arrive at his home to do  some installs and repairs, he greets me with 5 magazines, cookbook and a 4-pack of DVD's. I thought that was very nice of him, and I wanted to share it with you guys. This was the first time I had met the man and all I did was mention in our intial conversation that I enjoyed makeing fish laugh at me. Then he gives me this stuff, what a guy!
That's really great Albert.  That was a better day than mine that's for sure  Joey
Nice. I had a client give me a custom built 6ft 4 weight cane flyrod once. Generousity is an amazing thing.
I got a glass of water from a client today.
I got yelled at by a client...thats something    lol
That was very nice of him, glad you had such a good day, thanks for sharing...  Maureen
My wife is speaking to me again...Told me to "Shut my mouth"...  Old joke but then...I'm an old guy...
